SELECTOR - Static variable in interface itec.minicompiler.ConstantsInterface
 
SEMICOLON - Static variable in interface itec.minicompiler.ConstantsInterface
 
SIMPLEEXPRESSION - Static variable in interface itec.minicompiler.ConstantsInterface
 
SINGLE - Static variable in interface itec.minicompiler.ConstantsInterface
 
STATEMENT - Static variable in interface itec.minicompiler.ConstantsInterface
 
STATEMENTSEQUENCE - Static variable in interface itec.minicompiler.ConstantsInterface
 
Scanner - class itec.minicompiler.Scanner.
The Scanner implements the actions necessary to extract the Token out of the source code.
Scanner(String, ErrorHandler) - Constructor for class itec.minicompiler.Scanner
Initialize the Scanner with a source code sc and an ErrorHandler e.
SimpleToken - class itec.minicompiler.SimpleToken.
The SimpleToken implements a keyword or an operation found in the source code.
SimpleToken(int) - Constructor for class itec.minicompiler.SimpleToken
Initialize the SimpleToken with a kind k.
StructuralSymbol - class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.StructuralSymbol.
The StructuralSymbol implements a Symbol in the SymbolTable which is used to build the structure of the SymbolTable.
StructuralSymbol(String) - Constructor for class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.StructuralSymbol
Initialize the StructuralSymbol with a name n and set the kind to 0 (i.e. the StructuralSymbol is undefined).
Symbol - class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.Symbol.
The Symbol implements a Symbol in the SymbolTable.
Symbol(String) - Constructor for class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.Symbol
Initialize the Symbol with the name n.
SymbolTable - class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.SymbolTable.
The SymbolTable implements a linked list of Symbols the Parser uses to maintain the structure of the Symbols given by the source code and to do the scoping.
SymbolTable(Symbol) - Constructor for class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.SymbolTable
Initialize the SymbolTable with a UNIVERSE-Symbol sym.
scanner - Variable in class itec.minicompiler.Parser
The Scanner used by the actual Parser
selector(Symbol) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.Parser
Implements the grammar-rule: Selector -> {("." ident)|("[" Expression "]")}
setAddress(int) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.AddressedSymbol
Set the address of the actual AddressedSymbol.
setBaseType(Type) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.ArrayType
Set the basetype of the actual ArrayType.
setBoolean() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.BasicType
Make the actual BasicType an BOOLEAN-Type (i.e. set the kind to BOOLEAN).
setFields(Symbol) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.RecordType
Set the fields of the actual RecordType.
setHead() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.StructuralSymbol
Make the actual StructuralSymbol a HEAD-Symbol (i.e. set the kind to HEAD).
setInteger() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.BasicType
Make the actual BasicType an INTEGER-Type (i.e. set the kind to INTEGER).
setKind(int) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.Token
Set the kind of the actual Token.
setLength(int) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.ArrayType
Set the length of the actual ArrayType.
setLevel(int) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.Symbol
Set the level of the actual Symbol.
setLocal(Symbol) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.Symbol
Set the local scope of the actual Symbol.
setModule() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.StructuralSymbol
Make the actual StructuralSymbol a MODULE-Symbol (i.e. set the kind to MODULE).
setName(String) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.Symbol
Set the name of the actual Symbol.
setNext(Symbol) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.Symbol
Set the next Symbol after the actual Symbol.
setParameterIn() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.AddressedSymbol
Make the actual AddressedSymbol to a PARAMETER_IN-Symbol (i.e. set the kind to PARAMETER_IN).
setParameterInOut() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.AddressedSymbol
Make the actual AddressedSymbol to a PARAMETER_IN_OUT-Symbol (i.e. set the kind to PARAMETER_IN_OUT).
setProcedure() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.AddressedSymbol
Make the actual AddressedSymbol to a PROCEDURE-Symbol (i.e. set the kind to PROCEDURE).
setSize(int) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.Type
Set the size of the actual Type.
setType(Type) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.TypedSymbol
Set the Type of the actual TypedSymbol.
setUniverse() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.StructuralSymbol
Make the actual StructuralSymbol a UNIVERSE-Symbol (i.e. set the kind to UNIVERSE).
setUpscope(Symbol) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.Symbol
Set the upscope of the actual Symbol.
setValue(String) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.IdentToken
Set the value of the actual IdentToken.
setValue(int) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.NumberToken
Set the value of the actual NumberToken.
setValue(int) - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.ValuedSymbol
Set the value of the actual ValuedSymbol.
setVariable() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.AddressedSymbol
Make the actual AddressedSymbol to a VARIABLE-Symbol (i.e. set the kind to VARIABLE).
simpleExpression() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.Parser
Implements the grammar-rule: SimpleExpression -> ["+"|"-"] Term {("+"|"-"|"OR") Term}
singles - Variable in class itec.minicompiler.Scanner
The set of special characters
size - Variable in class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.Type
The size of the Type in bytes
sourceCode - Variable in class itec.minicompiler.Scanner
The source code the Scanner works on
statement() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.Parser
Implements the grammar-rule: Statement -> [(ident(Assignment|ProcedureCall)) |IfStatement |WhileStatement |RepeatStatement]
statementSequence() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.Parser
Implements the grammar-rule: StatementSequence -> Statement {";" Statement}
stringRep() - Method in class itec.minicompiler.SimpleToken
Generate a String-representation of the kind of the actual SimpleToken.
symboltable - Variable in class itec.minicompiler.Parser
The SymbolTable the Parser builds up
